title: Tips For Creating A Capsule Wardrobe You'll Love For Years
itunes:title: Tips For Creating A Capsule Wardrobe You'll Love For Years
description:
Do you often have a hard time picking what to wear because of the number of clothing you have in your closet? Best believe youâ€™re not the only one! In this episode, we will help you minimize your closet to maximize your time, space, and budget as well as guide you in creating your own small collection of useful clothing you love, a Capsule Wardrobe. Join us as we also share tips and fun episodes on letting go and spending decisions with intention.
